title: Episode 213: Navigating Beauty and Disability with Chloé Cooper Jones
itunes:title: Episode 213: Navigating Beauty and Disability with Chloé Cooper Jones
description:
Chloé Cooper Jones (Easy Beauty) joins Kate and Doree to discuss how she learned to make space for herself in the world as a disabled woman, her favorite skincare prods, and why she thinks humans crave newness and how traveling can satisfy that appetite. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter.
